title: S1 Ep49: Letting managers manage
itunes:title: Letting managers manage
description: If you want to succeed as a boss, business books tell you, you have to delegate. But we know less than you think about the impact of delegation on productivity and profitability. Namrata Kala of MIT tells Tim Phillips how some Indian SOEs decided toÂ  let managers manage, giving us a new insight into the impact of managerial autonomy.
